resources.string: If you are facing any trouble on our App. We are there to help you. Your Feedback is important for us.
Invite your friends to the exiting world of CinwWhoop! in just a Click.
Find your session at one of our cinema partners. Once you purchase your ticket we will email your ticket to the email address provided. If you sign up you can also view your ticket from ‘My Account’.
1. Some session times may not be available due to high volume of bookings and popularity of the film, please check with the cinema before booking if you are looking for a particular session time.

2. Redeem online - Booking fee applies for online booking with the cinemas. Please check the cinema website for details www.hoyts.com.au 
 Book in advance over the phone with the following cinemas:
 www.newfarmcinemas.com.au 
 www.yataladrive-in.com.au

3. Restaurant coupons are for one time use only. Easy and simple just present your voucher at the venue and avail your discounts and pay directly to the venue. Please check validity on your coupon. Some venues require previous reservations as there may be limited availability on weekends.
4. Extra $3 per person fees applies on all 3D shows payable directly to the cinemas.

5. All bookings subject to availability. It is recommended to book well in advance. Please expect a high demand for all bookings especially weekends. No refunds if your preferred date is unavailable. Merchants have the right to offer fixed availabilities for voucher holders to allow space for full paying customers.
6. Not valid for commercial use, not for resale and not redeemable for cash
7. Our customer support team works 24/7 to ensure you have a great experience. You can get in touch with us through “contact us” at any time and we will contact you as early as possible.
GET E-TICKET AND E-COUPON ON PHONE
ENJOY YOUR MOVIE AND DINNER NIGHT OUT
